ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Chains\Binding no longer overwrites snare
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey nobody else has answered this???  It sounds vaguely familiar but I can t place it and its driving me batty!!  Where is this reference from? Kitasi ...
ygData.messageBody:
Hey nobody else has answered this??? It sounds vaguely familiar but I can't
place it and its driving me batty!! Where is this reference from?

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Gordon Hughes [mailto:ghughes@...]
Sent: Monday, January 15, 2001 3:44 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Chains\Binding no longer overwrites snare


>
You guys have lost me. I dont get in pickup group very often at all these
days...what does that phrase mean? (i may be showing my age here lol)
>

Sorry Lago, out of all that is decent and good, I can't tell you where it
comes from for fear that it'll melt your brain and poison the goodly nature
of this list.

But, lists being lists, I can count on some other dumb shmuck to do it for
me. ;)
